description.value:
Some visitants can cast the following innate occult spells. If you give a visitant the following spells, consider removing one of its other special abilities.

Occult Innate Spells

DC varies

Spell Attack varies

1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fear]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ray of Enfeeblement]{Ray of Enfeeblement}

Constant (1st) @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Alignment]{Detect Alignment (evil only)}

source.value: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
